articles.author: JOSH FUNK
articles.title: Warren Buffett is sitting on over $325 billion cash as Berkshire Hathaway keeps selling Apple stock - The Associated Press
articles.description: Warren Buffett is now sitting on more than $325 billion cash after continuing to unload billions of dollars worth of Apple and Bank of America shares this year and continuing to collect a steady stream of profits from all of Berkshire Hathaway’s assorted busi…
articles.content: OMAHA, Neb. (AP) Warren Buffett is now sitting on more than $325 billion cash after continuing to unload billions of dollars worth of Apple and Bank of America shares this year and continuing to coll… [+3812 chars]
